title: Co-Applicant adopted out
question: A wnaeth {{ deceasedName }} fabwysiadu rhiant ({{ applicantName }} plentyn ({{ deceased name}}) yn gyfreithlon allan o’u teulu nhw (eu rhoi i ffwrdd i gael eu mabwysiadu)?

adoptedOut.required: Dewiswch ‘Do’ os cafodd rhiant {{ applicantName }} eu mabwysiadu allan o deulu {{ deceasedName }}
